title: Margin of Error Calculator â€“ Proportions, Means, & Sample Size

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: For a proportion (worst case when p=0.5): \( ME = z \sqrt{ \frac{p(1-p)}{n} } \) If population size N is known and not huge, apply finite population correction: \( ME_{FPC} = ME \times \sqrt{ \frac{N - 1}{N - n} } \) For a mean: \( ME = z \frac{s}{\sqrt{n}} \)
